Class ApplicationService

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.services.ApplicationService
public class ApplicationService extends Object
Contains the core logic for managing BTO applications. With business logic input validation. This service handles tasks like viewing projects, applying, checking status, approving/rejecting applications and withdrawals, and generating receipts. It interacts with repositories to access and modify data.

  • Field Details

    • appContext

      private AppContext appContext
      The application context providing access to repositories and current user state.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationService

      public ApplicationService(AppContext appContext)
      Creates an ApplicationService using the shared application context.
      Parameters:
      appContext - Provides access to repositories and the current user.

  • Method Details

    • viewAvailableProjectsForApplicant

      public void viewAvailableProjectsForApplicant()
      Shows the current applicant a list of BTO projects they can apply for. It filters projects based on visibility, applicant eligibility, and whether they've already applied.

    • getAvailableProjectsForApplicant

      public List<BTOProjectModel> getAvailableProjectsForApplicant()

    • isProjectVisibleForApplicant

      private boolean isProjectVisibleForApplicant(UserModel currentUser, BTOProjectModel project)
      Checks if a specific project should be visible to an applicant. Considers project visibility, previous applications, and applicant eligibility rules (age, marital status, flat availability).
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The applicant checking the project.
      project - The project to check visibility for.
      Returns:
      True if the applicant can see and potentially apply for this project, false otherwise.

    • applyToProject

      public Boolean applyToProject(ProjectRepo projectRepo, Scanner scanner, UserModel currentUser)
      Guides an applicant (or an officer acting as one) through applying for a BTO project. Prompts for project ID and flat type, validates input and eligibility, and saves the application if valid.
      Parameters:
      projectRepo - Repository to access project data.
      scanner - Scanner for getting user input.
      currentUser - The user submitting the application.
      Returns:
      True if the application was successfully created, false if the user cancelled or an error occurred.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public ApplicationStatus viewApplicationStatus(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Gets the current status of a specific application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to check.
      Returns:
      The current status (e.g., PENDING, SUCCESSFUL).

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public void updateApplicationStatus(BTOApplicationModel application, ApplicationStatus status)
      Directly sets the status of an application. Use with caution; prefer methods like `approveApplicantApplication` for status changes with logic.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to update.
      status - The new status to set.

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      A simple method to mark an application as SUCCESSFUL. Does not include checks for flat availability or user authorization.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to mark as approved.

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      A simple method to mark an application as UNSUCCESSFUL. Does not include user authorization checks.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to mark as rejected.

    • generateReceipt

      public Receipt generateReceipt(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Creates a receipt object containing details of a BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to generate a receipt for.
      Returns:
      A Receipt object.

    • approveApplicantApplication

      public Boolean approveApplicantApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Approves an applicant's BTO application after checking authorization and flat availability. If approved, updates the application status and deducts the flat from the project's count.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to approve.
      Returns:
      True if approval was successful, false if unauthorized or no flats available.

    • rejectApplicantApplication

      public Boolean rejectApplicantApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Rejects an applicant's BTO application after checking authorization. Updates the application status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject.
      Returns:
      True if rejection was successful, false if unauthorized.

    • approveApplicantWithdrawalApplication

      public boolean approveApplicantWithdrawalApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Approves an applicant's request to withdraw their application. Checks authorization, updates status to WITHDRAWN, adds the flat back to the project count, and clears withdrawal flags/booking details.
      Parameters:
      application - The application whose withdrawal is being approved.
      Returns:
      True if withdrawal approval was successful, false if unauthorized or an error occurred.

    • rejectApplicantWithdrawalApplication

      public boolean rejectApplicantWithdrawalApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Rejects an applicant's request to withdraw their application. Checks authorization and resets the withdrawal request flag on the application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application whose withdrawal is being rejected.
      Returns:
      True if withdrawal rejection was successful, false if unauthorized.

    • updateApplicationStatusToBooked

      public boolean updateApplicationStatusToBooked(int applicationID)
      Updates an application's status from SUCCESSFUL to BOOKED. Typically used after the flat selection process.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application to update.
      Returns:
      True if the application was found, was SUCCESSFUL, and is now BOOKED. False otherwise.

    • updateApplicationFlatType

      public boolean updateApplicationFlatType(int applicationID, FlatType newFlatType, List<FlatType> availableFlatTypes)
      Changes the flat type selected in an application. Validates the new flat type against available types and updates project flat counts accordingly.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application to modify.
      newFlatType - The desired new flat type.
      availableFlatTypes - A list of flat types currently available in the project.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false if the application wasn't found or the type is invalid.

    • viewApplicationByNRIC

      public boolean viewApplicationByNRIC(int projectID, String nric, BTOApplicationModel[] outputApplication)
      Finds an application within a specific project based on the applicant's NRIC. Used by officers/managers to look up applications. Checks if the officer is authorized for the project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to search within.
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      outputApplication - An array (size 1) to hold the found application.
      Returns:
      True if an application by that NRIC exists in that project and the officer is authorized, false otherwise.
